member.name: T:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx
member.summary: Provides a set of static methods for adapting MyChannels.Nirvana objects to observable sequences.

member.name: M:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx.ToObservable(MyChannels.Nirvana.IConsumer)
member.summary: Converts MessageReceived events to an observable sequence.

member.name: M:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx.ToObservable(MyChannels.Nirvana.IDataGroupSession)
member.summary: Converts MessageReceived events to an observable sequence.

member.name: M:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx.ToStreamAddedObservable(MyChannels.Nirvana.IDataGroupSession)
member.summary: Converts StreamAdded events to an observable sequence.

member.name: M:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx.ToStreamRemovedObservable(MyChannels.Nirvana.IDataGroupSession)
member.summary: Converts StreamRemoved events to an observable sequence.

member.name: M:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx.ToDataGroupAddedObservable(MyChannels.Nirvana.IDataGroupSession)
member.summary: Converts DataGroupAdded events to an observable sequence.

member.name: M:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx.ToDataGroupRemovedObservable(MyChannels.Nirvana.IDataGroupSession)
member.summary: Converts DataGroupRemoved events to an observable sequence.

member.name: M:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx.ToDataGroupCreatedObservable(MyChannels.Nirvana.IDataGroupSession)
member.summary: Converts DataGroupCreated events into an observable sequence.

member.name: M:MyChannels.Nirvana.NirvanaRx.ToDataGroupDeletedObservable(MyChannels.Nirvana.IDataGroupSession)
member.summary: Converts DataGroupDeleted events into an observable sequence.
